abstract: Byron Trott, the vice chairman of investment banking at Goldman Sachs, is perhaps the only banker Warren E. Buffett will take calls from.
snippet: Byron Trott, the vice chairman of investment banking at Goldman Sachs, is perhaps the only banker Warren E. Buffett will take calls from.
lead_paragraph: WARREN E. BUFFETT is no fan of investment bankers. He prefers to broker his own deals and investigate companies the old-fashioned way — by reading balance sheets, preferably with his feet up and drinking a cherry Coke.

headline.main: When This Banker Talks, Even Buffett Listens
